original_text: What does that teach us about God? Some people are like pots that are ready for God to destroy. God is angry with people like that. He is ready to show his power against them. But he has chosen to wait patiently. He keeps his anger for later.
korean_text: 만일 하나님이 그의 진노를 보이시고 그의 능력을 알게 하고자 하사 멸하기로 준비된 진노의 그릇을 오래 참으심으로 관용하시고

sentences.original_text: What does that teach us about God?
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 우리에게 하나님에 대해 무엇을 가르쳐주나요?

sentences.original_text: that are ready for God to destroy
God is angry with people like that
He is ready to show his power against them
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 그들에 대해 자신의 능력을 보이기에 준비되어 있습니다

sentences.original_text: But he has chosen to wait patiently
He keeps his anger for later
